title: Okehampton Roman fort and fortlet
description: A Roman fort and a series of five associated enclosures situated on a hilltop overlooking the valley of the River Okement to the northwest and Okehampton town to the southwest. Excavations suggest that the site was occupied ca. A.D. 50-80.

properties.description: Location of the modern associated settlement based on a node derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of modern Okehampton
